hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ -f "/usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh" ]; then . /usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh fi
GIT_BRANCH_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_BRANCH} | cut -d "/" -f 2` GIT_COMMIT_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_COMMIT} | cut -c1-7`
cp /usr/local/docker-config/httpd/httpd-vhosts.conf . cp -r /usr/local/docker-config/httpd/cert .
#docker build --build-arg http_proxy=$http_proxy --build-arg https_proxy=$http_proxy --build-arg no_proxy="$no_proxy" \ #--build-arg HTTP_PROXY=$http_proxy --build-arg HTTPS_PROXY=$http_proxy --build-arg NO_PROXY="$no_proxy" \ #-t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-ui:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} . #docker tag hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-ui:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-ui:LATEST
#TODO: Add back proxy
docker build -f Dockerfile -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-frontend:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} . docker tag hms-dbmi/pic-sure-frontend:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} hms-dbmi/pic-sure-frontend:LATEST
docker stop httpd && docker rm httpd docker run --name=httpd --restart always --network=picsure \ -v /var/log/httpd-docker-logs/:/usr/local/apache2/logs/ \ -v $DOCKER_CONFIG_DIR/httpd/cert:/usr/local/apache2/cert/ \ -p 80:80 \ -p 443:443 \ -d hms-dbmi/pic-sure-frontend:LATEST #docker exec httpd sed -i '/^#LoadModule proxy_wstunnel_module/s/^#//' conf/httpd.conf #docker restart httpd
